title: Acquia Cloud Site Factory Duplication
name: Acquia:SiteFactoryDuplication
description: Ensure the Acquia Cloud Site Factory Duplication module is enabled.
success: Acquia Cloud Site Factory Duplication module is enabled.
failure: Acquia Cloud Site Factory Duplication module is not enabled.
remediation: Install and enable the Acquia Cloud Site Factory Duplication module into your codebase.
